title: Crispy halloumi cheese with caper sauce
ingredients: ['For the caper sauce', '4 tablespoons capers', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds, crushed', 'ground black pepper', 'For the halloumi', '1 (250g) packet halloumi cheese, sliced 1 cm thick', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '25g fresh coriander - leaves only, chopped', 'salt and ground black pepper']
